text: @realDonaldTrump 54000 Americans are dead and almost 1,000,000 are infected with Coronavirus, yet you tweet stupid stuff about Noble?  and feel sorry for yourself about how poorly you’re treated by the media. @BarackObama or @HillaryClinton would not have let this many people die. Do your job!
